import axios from'axios';var http=axios.create({baseURL:process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:3001',// Indicas el puesrto en el que está levantada la API
withCredentials:true});http.interceptors.response.use(function(response){return response.data;},function(error){if(error.response&&error.response.status===401){localStorage.clear();window.location.assign('/login');}return Promise.reject(error);});var login=function login(_ref){var email=_ref.email,password=_ref.password;return http.post('/login',{email:email,password:password});};var search=function search(_search){return http.get('/search',{params:{q:_search}});};var register=function register(data){return http.post('/register',data);};var logout=function logout(){return http.post('/logout');};var profile=function profile(currentUser,id){return http.patch("/users/".concat(id),currentUser);};var getUser=function getUser(id){return http.get("/users/".concat(id));};var categories=function categories(){return http.get('/categories');};var product=function product(_product){return http.post('/items/new',_product);};var editProduct=function editProduct(product,id){return http.patch("/items/".concat(id),product);};var getByCategory=function getByCategory(category){return http.get("/categories/".concat(category));};var getAll=function getAll(){return http.get('/items');};var getThisProduct=function getThisProduct(id){return http.get("/items/".concat(id));};var createLike=function createLike(id,product){return http.post("/user/".concat(id,"/like/").concat(product));};var showLikes=function showLikes(id){return http.get("/user/likes/".concat(id));};var createChat=function createChat(id,idObj,product){return http.post("/chats/user/".concat(id,"/").concat(idObj,"/").concat(product));};var showChat=function showChat(product){return http.get("/chats/".concat(product));};var showAllMyChats=function showAllMyChats(id){return http.get("/chats/all/".concat(id));};var sendMessage=function sendMessage(id,idChat){return http.get("/chats/".concat(id,"/").concat(idChat));};var createMessage=function createMessage(idChat,data){return http.post("/messages/".concat(idChat),data);};var findMessages=function findMessages(id){return http.get("/messages/".concat(id));};export default{login:login,search:search,register:register,logout:logout,getUser:getUser,profile:profile,categories:categories,product:product,editProduct:editProduct,getByCategory:getByCategory,getAll:getAll,getThisProduct:getThisProduct,createLike:createLike,showLikes:showLikes,createChat:createChat,showChat:showChat,showAllMyChats:showAllMyChats,sendMessage:sendMessage,createMessage:createMessage,findMessages:findMessages};
